about_the_game:
Inexorable is a single-player first-person sci-fi narrative set in the year 2133.

People have left their humanity behind, exchanging mortal flesh and bone for cold, undying metal and code. Most have become slaves of The Immortal, a group of independent AIs that have taken control of most aspects of the old, human civilization.

You are one of the few humans that kept true to his nature. After being chased from all cities and most continents, you and AND1, an AI banished by its own peers, trace a mysterious source of power ("The Light") that is able to disable everything that The Immortal touches.

Your mission is simple : Bring the Light to the Megalopolis, the heart of The Immortal's empire. On your way, you discover many hidden facts about the rise of AIs, the fall of human civilization and the nature of the world that has taken its place. Treacherous environments and enemies, strange entities and difficult choices lie ahead of you and your companion.


Humanity has lost. What comes next, is for you to decide!

Includes

  • A beautiful, stylized, immersive world

  • A story that adapts to your choices and evolves with you

  • Mysteries to solve, hidden allies to discover, challenging enemies to defeat

-Developed by Kalempirion Studios 13 -
-Solo-Dev : The DAC-
-Music by : Coraldi-

content_descriptors.notes:
You will be fighting cyborgs, drones and all varieties of enemies as well as deciding the fate of multiple characters in the game.  
The decisions you make will have an impact on the lives of human characters, cyborgs as well as AI companions. Most decisions have implicit impacts, but you are also able to attack other characters and influence their lives directly.

name: Inexorable

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 (4 * 3400), AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (4 * 3500) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4096 MB), Radeon RX 570 (8192 MB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700 (8 * 2900), AMD Ryzen 7 3700X (8 * 3600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 2060 Super (6144 MB), Radeon RX 5700 (8192 MB)

short_description: Inexorable is a single-player first-person sci-fi shooter narrative set in the year 2133. Navigate and fight your way to the digital heart of the Dark Megalopolis with your AI protégé at your side. Uncover the truth behind the rise of AIs and decide the fate of machines and humans alike.
